definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
lamella (under the cap of a mushroom)
a book is not judged by its cover (idiom)
pinyin: bao1 zi5 you3 rou4 bu4 zai4 zhe3 shang4

definition: variant of 皺褶|皱褶[zhou4 zhe3]
to make a mess of sth/to bungle/to mismanage

sentences.english: Do you have any other opinion towards garment using pleating as decoration?
sentences.chinese: 你對有打褶裝飾的服裝有沒有其他意見？

sentences.english: The seamstress bound the hem of the dress with a ruffle.
sentences.chinese: 女裁縫用褶襉飾邊給女上衣鑲邊。

sentences.english: Even normal gathers and folds can create value contrasts.
sentences.chinese: 即使是普通的褶襉或摺痕也能形成亮度的對比。

sentences.english: Most pleated filters also carry an electrostatic charge that attracts and holds dust.
sentences.chinese: 大多數帶褶濾網也帶有靜電荷以吸附灰塵。

sentences.english: A fold or pleat, as in some corolla.
Her dress was beautifully tucked with tiny stitches.
sentences.chinese: 她的衣服以密針縫了很好看的褶襉。

sentences.english: The baby's dress was beautifully tucked with tiny stitches.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒衫的褶襉打得針腳細密，很漂亮。

sentences.english: In the axis of superposed fold, the pulsation structure (micro-fissures) developed better than in the limb.
sentences.chinese: 疊加褶曲軸都是脈動構造發育的良好地段。

sentences.english: I didn't fancy myself wearing a kilt.
I wanted to express the character of Issey Miyake's obsession with the pleat in this flagship store.
sentences.chinese: 我想表達的特點三宅一生的癡迷與褶在這旗艦店。

sentences.english: Slash pockets with pleats at skirt.
sentences.chinese: 在大幅削減的口袋裏打褶的裙子。

sentences.english: Make sure the wet sheets aren't bunched up otherwise they won't dry properly.
sentences.chinese: 確保溼被單別打褶，否則他們幹得不整齊。

sentences.english: Their clothes were all bunched up after being in suitcases for so long.
sentences.chinese: 他們的衣服在衣箱裏放的時間這麼長，以至都打褶了。

sentences.english: The visceral mass is covered by a mantle extending as a fold(s) enclosing the mantle cavity.
sentences.chinese: 內臟團是由封閉外套腔的褶反所履蓋。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
